overview: On this DVD, Paul and his band discuss and demonstrate how to:  * identify and eliminate distractions * utilize the flow factors of "themes, keys, and tempos" * develop a seamless setlist * change keys and transition smoothly * cultivate a heart of worship in your team  Beyond mere instruction, each concept is demonstrated using footage from several LIVE worship sessions. This practical approach models to your worship team what canâ€™t be learned from a book.
title: Leading Worship: Creating Flow
